This is only possible, if the requested game is in a state that
can be deleted

parameters.name: gameId

get.summary: Get messages for a single game

parameters.name: isPublic
parameters.description: Value indicating whether to return only public messages, default is true

200.description: Messages posted in the requested game

post.summary:
Leave the given game, only possible if game hasn't started yet, and current player
is not the creator.

Surrender in the given game, only possible if current player
and game are still active.

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: Id of game to surrender in

patch.summary: Hides the given game for the current player
Hide all games which can be hidden for the current player

get.summary: Get map template identified by name
Returns the last 10 news items for all languages

post.summary: Exchange cards for the current player. Which cards to exchange is automatically chosen to gain the most bonus for the player.
Attack from one to another country.

Move units between countries. Only allowed after placing. Cancels any attacks that the player had left before. Attacking is not
possible anymore after moving.
